entry.title: WIND WARNING, Lacombe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 a.m. MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few rain showers beginning early this evening and ending before morning then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 at times overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High 13.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 at times early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
